column2: "Oh„ÄÅ<%me>! Hey listen! I saw that Idol perform just a while ago!"
"She was gorgeous, and those moves... I was entranced..."
"I never realized music could be so powerful..."
"I thought about something during her performance."
"It was a really happy, bubbly song."
"But y'know, underneath all that, there was like this deep, hidden sadness..."
"She smiles ear to ear, but I can't help but wonder how she really feels inside..."
